NT3D_rectangle_o Class Reference

NT3D_rectangle_o class Draws an recangular area composed of steps^2 rectanlges which lies flat in the X-Y-plane (width-height) with the lower left corner in the origin. More...

#include <nt3d_rectangle_obj.h>
